耾耾耾

耾字的基本解释

耾
hóng
〔耾耾〕形容声音大，如“耾耾雷声”。
耳中声。

耾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hōng］
［《廣韻》户萌切，平耕，匣。］
形容大声。

耾字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耳字部】　耾； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页966第13
【唐韻】戸萌切【韻會】乎盲切，?音宏。【博雅】聾也。【玉篇】耳語也。【韻會】一曰耳中聲。　又【韻會】大聲。【宋玉·風賦】耾耾雷聲。【揚子·法言】非雷非霆，隱隱耾耾。【左思·吳都賦】與夫唱和之隆響，動鐘鼓之鏗耾有殷。　又【集韻】呼宏切，音訇。又【五音集韻】烏宏切，音泓。義?同。　【集韻】或作?。

耾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
耾字的起名意思

形容声音大，如“耾耾雷声”。

Elder
Basic explanation of words
Elder
hóng
〔耾耾〕 Describes a loud voice, such as "the sound of thunder."
Sound in the ears.
Elder
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hōng］
["Guang Yun" Hu Meng cut, flat farming, box. ]
Describe loudly.
Elder
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Ear word department] 　耾; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 966 13
[Tang Yun] 戸 Meng cut [Rhyme will] almost blind cut,? Yinhong. [Bo Ya] Deaf also. [Jade articles] Whispers too. [Rhyme Meeting] Yi said the sound in the ear.　[Yunhui] Loudly again. [Song Yu·Fu] The sound of thunder. 【Yangtze·Fayan】Neither thunder nor Ting, but faintly intermittent. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Singing harmony with your husband is a great sound of playing the bells and drums.　[Jiyun] Hu Hongqie, Yinxun. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] Wu Hongqie, Yinhong. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or make?.
